### multiple line code
```html
<html>
<head>
  <title>Title of the document</title>
</head>

<body>
  <h1>This is a heading</h1>
  <p>This is a paragraph.</p>
</body>

</html>
```
```javascript
console.log('hello')
```
```css
head{
    background-color:green;
}

```
